name: Primal Trapper
description:
Install instructions

Made in Godot Engine 3.0 for the minibeansjam2 game jam (48 hours).

We are aware of bugs.

Save the dinos on your island by bringing them into your enclosure!

Controls:

1-3 - Switch trap/baits

Left Mouse - Place trap / throw bait, dismount

Walk into a stunned dino to mount it.

Credits:

@Dalton5000: Graphics, Programming, Design

@Wagshadow: Programming, Design
